thread.title: This Viral Video Of A Dads And Daughters Ballet Class Is Beyond Adorable
thread.title_full: This Viral Video Of A Dads And Daughters Ballet Class Is Beyond Adorable

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: This Viral Video Of A Dads And Daughters Ballet Class Is Beyond Adorable
text:
Partnering with Dad on Valentine's Day!!! ‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§
A post shared by Philadelphia Dance Center (@pdc5678) on Feb 14, 2017 at 2:48pm PST
 On Valentine's Day this year, the Philadelphia Dance Center in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, decided to celebrate a love that doesn't get enough attention: the one between daughters and their dads. To do so, they hosted a "Daddy Daughter Ballet Class," inviting fathers to join in on their daughters' dancing.
The resulting videos went viral on the dance studio's Facebook page because they are as sweet as they are hilarious.
Daddy Daughter Valentine's Ballet Class ‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§
A post shared by Philadelphia Dance Center (@pdc5678) on Feb 14, 2017 at 4:41pm PST
They even wore tutus!
Dad's are MOVING ALONG TONIGHT!!!‚ù§üíØ
A post shared by Philadelphia Dance Center (@pdc5678) on Feb 14, 2017 at 5:37pm PST
 The older generation wasn't spared either.
Dad's moving right along the floor tonight!!! Jumping turning, so impressive!!!
A post shared by Philadelphia Dance Center (@pdc5678) on Feb 14, 2017 at 5:42pm PST
Yes, they're terrible, but they gave it their all because that's what you do for your little girl.
DAD'S BROUGHT THEIR A GAME TONIGHT!!!
A post shared by Philadelphia Dance Center (@pdc5678) on Feb 14, 2017 at 4:44pm PST
To more of this üëèüëèüëè.
I CAN'T THANK THESE GENTLEMAN ENOUGH FOR MAKING THIS DAY SO VERY SPECIAL!!! THANK YOU, THANK YOU!!! HAPPY VALENTINE'S DAY ‚ù§
A post shared by Philadelphia Dance Center (@pdc5678) on Feb 14, 2017 at 5:46pm PST
From: Elle
From: ELLE
